dt: {bc}the quality or state of being {d_link|manly|manly:2} (as by having qualities such as strength or virility that are traditionally associated with a man)

dt.t: They'd been trained to identify emotional repression as the essence of {wi}manliness{/wi}. Men who broke down, or cried, or admitted to feeling fear, were sissies, weaklings, failures. Not men.

shortdef: the quality or state of being manly (as by having qualities such as strength or virility that are traditionally associated with a man)
